scripts.dev:windows: concurrently -n api,indexer,web -c blue,green,magenta "python -m uvicorn server.main:app --reload --reload-dir .\server --port 8000" "python -u indexer/main.py" "cd webapp && yarn dev"
scripts.dev:mac: concurrently -n api,indexer,web -c blue,green,magenta "uvicorn server.main:app --reload --reload-dir .\server --port 8000" "python -u indexer/main.py" "cd webapp && yarn dev"
